name: Dark Team Liquid + Liquipedia
description: Darkens the colors on Team Liquid website. The Liquipedia has been designed to match my Dota 2 Wiki theme.

user.name: DeathTBO
user.about:
((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

FreeStyler & FreeStyler team or other style-ripper bots are not allowed use my themes on any website.

Under "No Redistribution" license you need to ask me to use or modify my styles. If you want to install them from userstyles.org and only apply to stylish or stylus extensions feel free to do so without asking.

((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

Thanks DestructiveBurn for the beautiful license terms.

additional_info:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

Version 1.6

Liquipedia had a major change that broke the compatibility. I did a minor update making it readable. More fixes to come!

Version 1.5

Fixed post background covering images.

Version 1.4

Added support for Dota 2 and Hearthstone.

Version 1.2

Fixed text color and sidebar background color.

Version 1.1

Fixed forum post backgrounds.

Version 1.0

Fixed the main site.
